 * The DrugInteractionBean class represents a bean object that stores information about drug interactions.
 * It contains three variables: firstDrug, secondDrug, and description, which hold the names of the drugs involved
 * in the interaction and a description of the interaction, respectively.

 * This class provides methods to get and set the values of these variables, allowing for easy manipulation of drug interaction data.
 * 
 * The main functionalities of this class include:
 * - Storing information about drug interactions
